programme.title: Wake Up to Summer
programme.short_synopsis: Alistair Cooke considers how people alter their politics from a national to a local level.
programme.medium_synopsis: Alistair Cooke reflects on how people switch their political interests from the national to the local and the talents of the mocking bird.
